concept.title: What are Mail App Credentials?
concept.shortdesc: Learn what are "credentials" in the Mail App.

conbody.p: Credentials are your unique username and password for your Mail App account. In order to use the Mail App, you have to create an account with your username, full name, and password. To learn how to create an account, see the page.
Each time you want to log in to your Mail App, you will be promted to enter the credentials you chose when creating your account in order to validate your identity and access your emails.
